content: I'm currently on page 250 of 'The Nightingale' by Kristin Hannah, and I'm really getting into it. I'd like to apply the principles from 'Atomic Habits' and 'Deep Work' to improve my reading habits. Can you help me create a plan to increase my reading speed and retention? Specifically, I'd like to know how to schedule my reading sessions, eliminate distractions, and practice active reading.
